description: Reviews a lead's interaction history (past notes, site visits, communications) provided via UI context and generates a personalized follow-up message draft (SMS/email/WhatsApp tone), optimal timing suggestion, and conversation talking points tailored to Indian real estate sales

example_response.message_tone: Tone of the message: SMS, Email, or WhatsApp
example_response.urgency_level: High, Medium, or Low urgency assessment
